name: Pararomantic
description:
Pararomantic is a dating-simulator visual-novel with horror theme, where you can get to know and even date the monsters, who reside in a tavern named the Inbetween!

This is a demo version made as a university course on game design basics. The game was done in Unreal Engine utilizing the Visual Novel Framework designed by Woodsy Studios and featuring charming retro graphics akin to PS1.

We hope you find our little game enjoyable and we'd love to hear your thoughts on the demo!
